segments.text: Excuse me . Do you have a minute ? I'd like to tell you about the Bucky Card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... alright . I guess I have a minute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know about the Bucky Card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've heard about it , but I don't really know about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Bucky Card is a great way for you to save money while you have a good time here at school.It gives you discounts on all kinds of things . Movies , pizza , clothing , school supplies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Card doesn't actually give you discounts on beer.But it will give you discounts on certain club cover charges.So if you want to see your favorite band at Amy's or Cosmo's Club , you get a discount on the entrance fee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's pretty cool . How much of a discount ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Usually it's two dollars off the cover price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And all these other things , pizza and movies for instance--how much of a discount do I get on that stuff ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This pamphlet shows you what restaurants and movie theaters have discounts.And twice every semester we will send you a new issue of the pamphlet.The Bucky Card has just started.Every couple months we have new businesses joining our program.It ' s a great way for students to save money !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , alright . Let me look at that pamphlet.Hmm . Alessio's Pizza Parlor . That's cool . I go there all the time.And Cosmo's Club . And 4 - D records . Alright . How much does it cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It costs only 19 dollars a year for a card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whoa ! That's expensive ! It should be cheaper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But think of how much money you'll save ! You can use it for a year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , maybe . Alright . Give me an application form .
segments.speaker: S2
